reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's scalloped edges, which add a unique style, and appreciate its wonderful length that's not too long or sloppy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater, great material
items.body: Very pretty sweater, great material. Smooth with a slightly heavy feel, feels high-end. I found the length to be good, not too long or sloppy (even though I have a bit of a shorter torso). I bought the white, size small, seemed true to size and not see-through. I think it's priced on the high side, I purchased on sale which made it a better value. Read more
items.author: SEN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this one
items.body: Beautiful, well made and fits perfectly! Nice warm sweater with a feline touch! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality sweater
items.body: Great quality item, medium weight not thin but not too heavy either. Soft texture next to skin. Very finished look, can pair with anything. Dress it up or down. True to size. Size large fit nicely for a 38 DD Read more
items.author: Cheri

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute scallops
items.body: This red clolor is very nice and I love the scallop detail. I did not like the shoulders which are a bit puffy. Fit is true. Read more
items.author: Sheri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Very nice material, soft and perfect weight. Dress up or down. I’ve only worn once but seems to be good quality. Read more
items.author: K Smith

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft. Love the scallops. Downside is pilling after first wear.
items.body: Love the look k and comfort of the sweater. Have in green and beige. Green pilling badly. Have not worn beige yet Tags still on and I’m likely to return it for that reason. Read more
items.author: Bevberk

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink sweater
items.body: Soft, fits well. Has delightful ruffle neck but otherwise a classic look. I ordered the light pink. Love this sweater. Read more
items.author: Anne merkle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality!
items.body: love this sweater, it was just too large for me. The light blue color and scalloped edges are beautiful. I'll be reordering in a smaller size. I typically wear a large, sometimes a medium depending on the brand, I think the medium in this will be perfect! Read more
items.author: Marjorie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Brown, Forest Green, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Red, Wine Red, Almond, White, Purple, Caramel, Coral Pink, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
